    TIER MER Processing SOP

Function reference

MER Processing Function

ndoh_processing()
NDOH Processing Function

MER Helper Functions

clean_mfl()
Reshape MFL
dir_setup()
Set up processing folders
grab_mech_data()
Grab site-level mechanism mechdata from DATIM/recent MSD
import_ndoh()
Import NDOH tabs
map_disaggs()
Mapping DATIM UIDS to NDOH tab structure
ndoh_post_processing()
NDOH Post Processing Function
ndoh_wrapper()
Wrapper function to process NDOH data
partner_import()
Split into partner-level import files
pull_mech_uid()
Pull Partner/Mechanism Info from DATIM
read_all_the_things()
Read tabs from NDOH for each indicator and adjust column names
tidy_ndoh()
Tidy / munge NDOH import
validate_ndoh()
Validate facilities reported in NDOH by MFL
paint_green()
Paint console text in green
paint_iftrue()
Paint if true
paint_yellow()
Paint console text in yellow

Global Variables

usaid_dsp_district
USAID South Africa Districts
non_tier_qtr
Quarterly non-TIER indicators reported in NDOH file
tier_ann
Annual TIER indicators (use in Q4 only)
tier_kp_indic
Quarterly TIER indicators for KP tabs (use in each quarter)
tier_qtr
Quarterly TIER indicators (use Q1 and Q3)
tier_semi
Semi-Annual TIER indicators (use in Q2 only)
`%ni%`
Negate in

Indicator Column Names

kp_names
Standard names for KP tabs in NDOH
names_arvdisp
Standard names for ARVDISP tab in NDOH
names_hts_tst
Standard names for HTS_TST tab in NDOH
names_hts_tst_kp
Standard names for HTS_TST KP tab in NDOH
names_pmtct_art
Standard names for PMTCT_ART tab in NDOH
names_pmtct_eid
Standard names for PMTCT_EID tab in NDOH
names_pmtct_hei_pos
Standard names for PMTCT_HEI_POS tab in NDOH
names_prep_ct
Standard names for PrEP_CT tab in NDOH
names_prep_ct_kp
Standard names for PrEP_CT KP tab in NDOH
names_prep_new
Standard names for PrEP_NEW tab in NDOH
names_prep_new_kp
Standard names for PrEP_NEW KP tab in NDOH
names_tb_art
Standard names for TB_ART tab in NDOH
names_tb_prev
Standard names for TB_PREV tab in NDOH
names_tb_stat_d
Standard names for TB_STAT_D tab in NDOH
names_tb_stat_n
Standard names for TB_STAT_N tab in NDOH
names_tx_curr
Standard names for TX_CURR tab in NDOH
names_tx_curr_kp
Standard names for TX_CURR KP tab in NDOH
names_tx_ml
Standard names for TX_ML tab in NDOH
names_tx_ml_kp
Standard names for TX_ML KP tab in NDOH
names_tx_new
Standard names for TX_NEW tab in NDOH
names_tx_new_kp
Standard names for TX_NEW KP tab in NDOH
names_tx_pvls
Standard names for TX_PVLS tab in NDOH
names_tx_pvls_kp
Standard names for TX_PVLS KP tab in NDOH
names_tx_rtt
Standard names for TX_RTT tab in NDOH
names_tx_tb_d
Standard names for TX_TB_D tab in NDOH
names_tx_tb_n
Standard names for TX_TB_N tab in NDOH
standard_names
Standard names for each indicator tab in NDOH
